TemplateId: This will be filled in by the system
TemplateName: This will be filled in by the system

GameSettings.Name: Descriptive name for the game setting
GameSettings.Description: Brief overview of the game setting's theme, tone, and key features
GameSettings.StartingLocationId: leave as empty string - will be filled in during instantiation

Npcs.Name: Character Name
Npcs.Description: Brief description of character (role, motivation, notable traits)

Locations.Name: Location Name
Locations.Description: Brief description of the location (type, purpose, notable features)

Quests.Name: Quest Name
Quests.Description: Brief description of the quest (goal, key NPCs, locations involved)

Events.Name: Event Name
Events.Summary: Brief description of what happens during this event

TriggerValue.TargetTime: For Time triggers - when the event should occur (e.g., '3 days after game start')
TriggerValue.LocationId: For LocationChange/FirstLocationEntry triggers - leave empty, will be filled during instantiation
TriggerValue.LocationName: For LocationChange/FirstLocationEntry triggers - name of the location where event triggers

Events.Context: Additional information about the event's purpose or special conditions
